meanings.definition: The quality or state of being nubby.
meanings.sent1: The nubbinesses of the fabric made it feel rough against my skin.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the nubbinesses of the carpet under my feet as I walked.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to enjoy the nubbinesses of the scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The nubbinesses of the tree bark reminded me of tiny bumps on a road.
meanings.sent5: The nubbinesses of the sweater created a cozy texture that I loved.

meanings.definition: The presence of small, rough, or uneven protuberances on a surface.
meanings.sent1: I could see the nubbinesses on the surface of the basketball.
meanings.sent2: The nubbinesses on the wall made it difficult to paint smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The nubbinesses on the toast made it look like a miniature mountain range.
meanings.sent4: The nubbinesses on the road caused the car to bump along.
meanings.sent5: The nubbinesses on the cat's tongue felt rough against my hand.
